name: A Red Ball Bullet Escape! - Avoid Bouncing Spikes
name_original: A Red Ball Bullet Escape! - Avoid Bouncing Spikes
description:
A minimally addictive adventure! Red ball bullet escape is a fun and challenging avoidance skill game. Bounce and move to avoid the bullets!

> Use the arrows to control the ball
> Avoid the bullets
> Use the bomb once per game to bail you out
> Get 1 pt for every bullet avoided
> ..and most importantly- BEAT your friends' scores

Suggestions? Email us at support@yololabs.com. We decided not to nag you with "rate me" popups so please do us a solid and rate Red Ball Bullet Escape!
